chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall t : term, sem_equiv_prop_t t -> forall t0 : term_list, sem_equiv_prop_l t0 -> sem_equiv_prop_l (tcons t t0)

Premises:
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
sem_equiv_prop_l = fun l : term_list => forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p l n = true -> liste_reconnait d p l : term_list -> Prop
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
term_occur_0_2 : forall t : term, term_occur_def_0 t -> forall t0 : term_list, term_occur_def_1 t0 -> term_occur_def_1 (tcons t t0)
semantic_equiv_0_5 : forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), sem_equiv_prop_l t -> sem_equiv_prop_t (app a t)
term_list_term_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_list_term_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P0 t
term_term_list_rec : forall (P : term -> Set) (P0 : term_list -> Set), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_term_list_ind : forall (P : term -> Prop) (P0 : term_list -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P0 t -> P (app a t)) -> P0 tnil -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term_list, P0 t0 -> P0 (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term -> Prop, (forall t : term, P t t) -> (forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t (app a tl)) -> forall t t0 : term, term_occur t t0 -> P t t0
term_list_rec : forall P : term_list -> Set, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_rect : forall P : term_list -> Type, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
term_list_occur_ind : forall P : term -> term_list -> Prop, (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> P t tl -> P t (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), term_list_occur t t0 -> P t t0
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
indprinciple_3_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : term -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t
term_occur_0 : forall t u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t
indprinciple_term : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), P (app a t)) -> forall t : term, P t

term_occur_def_0 = fun t : term => forall u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t : term -> Prop
term_occur_def_1 = fun t : term_list => forall u : term, term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t : term_list -> Prop
indprinciple_3_aux = fun n : nat => forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t
tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
indprinciple_3_0 = fun (P : term -> Prop) (_ : forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) (t : term) (H0 : term_high t <= 0) => term_ind (fun t0 : term => term_high t0 <= 0 -> P t0) (fun (a : ad) (t0 : term_list) (H1 : term_high (app a t0) <= 0) => let H2 : 0 = 0 -> P (app a t0) := match H1 in (_ <= n) return (n = 0 -> P (app a t0)) with | @le_n _ => fun H2 : S (term_high_0 t0) = 0 => (fun H3 : S (term_high_0 t0) = 0 => let H4 : False := eq_ind (S (term_high_0 t0)) (fun e : nat => match e with | 0 => False | S _ => True end)...
term_occur_0_1 = fun (u : term) (H : term_list_occur u tnil) => term_ind (fun u0 : term => term_list_occur u0 tnil -> term_high u0 <= term_high_0 tnil) (fun (a : ad) (t : term_list) (H0 : term_list_occur (app a t) tnil) => let H1 : app a t = app a t -> tnil = tnil -> term_high (app a t) <= term_high_0 tnil := match H0 in (term_list_occur t0 t1) return (t0 = app a t -> t1 = tnil -> term_high (app a t) <= term_high_0 tnil) with | tlo_head t0 hd tl H1 => fun (H2 : t0 = app a t) (H3 : tcons hd tl = tnil) => (fun H4 : t0 = app a t => let H5 : t0 = app a t := H4 in eq_ind_r (fun t1 : term => tcons hd tl = tnil...
high_aux_3 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high t <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl)
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
term_occur_0_0 : forall (a : ad) (t : term_list), term_occur_def_1 t -> term_occur_def_0 (app a t)
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
high_aux_4 : forall (t : term) (tl : term_list), term_high_0 tl <= term_high_0 (tcons t tl)
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)

```  
intros t Ht t0 Ht0.
apply term_list_term_ind.
- exact Ht.
- intros t1 H1 t2 H2.
  apply term_occur_0_2.
  + exact H1.
  + exact H2.
- exact Ht0.
```

original: intros t Ht t0 Ht0. apply term_list_term_ind. - apply Ht. - intros t1 H1 t2 H2. apply term_occur_0_2. + apply H1. + apply H2. - apply Ht0.
